ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] An Idea
ygData.msgSnippet: ... you have to think back to prebazaar... The two biggest zones to sell goods in were.. GFay and EC, mainly because of the high concentration of noobs and
ygData.messageBody:
--- PsyKo <sibilant_ghost@...> wrote:
> =P so those of us too poor to buy luclin may gather in
> a lag free area to sell our goods without the
> disgusting economy of bazaar.. I mean batwings
> 10ppeach COME ON.. nuff said *yawn* time for bed
>


you have to think back to prebazaar... The two biggest
zones to sell goods in were.. GFay and EC, mainly because
of the high concentration of noobs and GFay because there
is a bank right there. I still sell my low end items in EC
and can make okay plat doing it.
good luck to all :)


=====
Steve aka Dr. Scurrilous PhD.
